headline: Is American Tower (AMT) Quietly Repositioning as an AI Infrastructure Backbone with 400G AWS Links?
summary: CoreSite, an American Tower company, recently launched native 400G Amazon Web Services Direct Connect at its Chicago data center campus, providing high-bandwidth, low-latency links for AI and enterprise workloads. This expansion of 400G connectivity to three CoreSite campuses strengthens American Tower’s role in supporting data-intensive industries that rely on real-time processing and latency-sensitive applications. We’ll examine how expanding 400G AWS Direct Connect capacity shapes...

headline: Mizuho Reduces the Firm’s PT on American Tower (AMT) stock
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 12, Mizuho reduced the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $189 from $217, while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. headline: Pentagon Deal Sends AST SpaceMobile Soaring—Is This the Next Leg Up?
summary: Shares of AST SpaceMobile surged on Friday after the company announced it was rewarded a government contract as part of the Golden Dome project.
